00057 void BdkPdfArgus::init(const char * theName,
00058                        const char * theDesc,
00059                        RooRealVar & dependent) {
00060   baseInit(theName, theDesc);
00061   setDependent(dependent);
00062   initParameters();
00063 }
00064 
00065 void BdkPdfArgus::setDependent(RooRealVar & dependent) {
00066   setIsValid(kFALSE);
00067   _dependent = &dependent;
00068 }
00069 
00070 void BdkPdfArgus::initParameters() {
00071   setIsValid(kFALSE);
00072   
00073   // now define the RooVars. The default parameters are good 
00074   // for missing mass:
00075   _endPoint = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName())+".endPoint" ," endPoint" , 5.289);
00076   
00077   _exp = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName())+".exp" ," exp", -30);
00078 
00079   ((RooRealVar*)_endPoint)->setConstant(kFALSE);
00080   ((RooRealVar*)_exp)->setConstant(kFALSE);
00081 
00082   // give resonable errors as first steps
00083   ((RooRealVar*)_endPoint)->setError(0.05);
00084   ((RooRealVar*)_exp)->setError(0.05);
00085 }
00086 
00087 
00088 void BdkPdfArgus::createPdf() {  
00089   _thePdf =
00090     new RooArgusBG(TString(GetName())+".pdf", TString(GetTitle()) + " Argus",
00091                    *_dependent, *_endPoint, *_exp);
00092 
00093   setIsValid(kTRUE);
00094 }
00095 
00096 RooArgSet BdkPdfArgus::dependents() {
00097   
00098   return RooArgSet(*_dependent);
00099 }
00100 
00101 void BdkPdfArgus::linkParameters(const BdkPdfArgus & pdf2) {
00102   setIsValid(kFALSE);
00103   linkParameters(pdf2._endPoint , pdf2._exp);
00104 }
00105 
00106 void BdkPdfArgus::linkParameters(RooAbsReal *endPoint,
00107                                  RooAbsReal *exp) {
00108   setIsValid(kFALSE);
00109   if ( endPoint != 0 ) {_endPoint = endPoint;}
00110   if ( exp != 0 ) {_exp = exp;} 
00111 }
